creation.title: Create new file
creation.subtitle: Enter a file name and select a file type to create a new document

empty.title: No files here yet
empty.subtitle: Press the button below to get started

manager.title: File manager
manager.subtitle: Select or create a document to start editing it in Miro

errors.failed_to_open: Could not open the file. The service is currently unavailable, please try again later.
errors.delete_locked: Cannot delete the document because it is locked.

notifications.documents_added: Please refresh ONLYOFFICE to view the newly added files.

installation.description: Please install or reinstall the app to continue

notconfigured.title: Configuration required
notconfigured.message: Please contact your administrator to configure the document server

banner.title: ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud
banner.description: Easily launch the editors in the cloud without downloading and installation

form.description: This app allows creating and editing office documents from Miro using ONLYOFFICE Docs (Document Server)

errors.bad_jwt: Failed to parse or sign JWT
errors.document_server_version_retrieval_error: Failed to validate document server version

demo.title: Connect to demo ONLYOFFICE Docs server
demo.description: This is a public test server, please do not use it for private sensitive data. The server will be available during a 30-day period.
demo.available_until: You are successfully connected to the demo server. It will be available until {{date}}. To disable it, uncheck the box.
demo.expired: The 30-day test period is over. You are no longer able to connect to the demo server.
